participating-org.narrative: The Law University of Ho Chi Minh, mainly through its affiliated consultation center has more than 10 years of conducting legal communication and legal assistance activities for not only inmates who currently serve sentences or are under detention, but also ex-prisoners who are currently released from prison. Up to now, the University has carried out hundreds of learning activities and mobilelegal assistance campaigns for people serving sentences in prisons and detention camps such as Thu Duc Prison (Binh Thuan), An Phuoc Prison (Binh Duong), Xuyen Moc Detention Center (Ba Ria - Vung Tau), Long Hoa Detention Center, Thanh Hoa Detention Center (Long An), Chi Hoa Detention Camp, Bo La Detention Camp (Ho Chi Minh City). In addition, Ho Chi Minh City University of Law has hosted meetings, legal communication and consulting activities for people who have finished their sentence living in in District 4, District 7,Binh Thanh District, Nha Be District in Ho Chi Minh City. The University supplied legal support to 20 cases of ex-convicts who havefinished their sentence living in Nha Be District,k Ho Chi Minh City/ Besides, City Law University. Ho Chi Minh City has sent students, lecturers and experts to directly get engaged with relevant agencies and organizations working to support prisoners and those who have served their imprisonment sentences. In addition, the Law Consulting Center of Ho Chi Minh City University of Law Ho Chi Minh City cooperates with relevant organizations and stakeholders (such as HoChi Minh City Police, Vietnam Youth Union of Ho Chi Minh City, Youth Union of Binh Duong Province, the Center for Research, Consulting, Social Work and Community Development) to carry out dissemination of labor law, residence law for workers living in other areas in the city. HCM, and for young workers in Binh Duong, etc.
